import React, { Component} from 'react' import {add} from './addtocart' import {view} from './addtocart' import pro1 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/1.jpg' import pro2 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/2.jpg' import pro3 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/3.jpg' import pro4 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/4.jpg' import pro5 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/5.jpg' import pro6 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/6.jpg' import pro7 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/7.jpg' import pro8 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/8.jpg' import pro9 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/9.jpg' import pro10 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/10.jpg' import pro11 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/11.jpg' import pro12 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/12.jpg' import pro13 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/13.jpg' import pro14 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/14.jpg' import pro15 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/15.jpg' import pro16 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/16.jpg' import pro17 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/17.jpg' import pro18 from '../img/MobilePhones/Apple/18.jpg' import MyHeader from './header'; import Navigation from './navigation' import Footer from './footer' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './css/rangeSlider.css' import BeautyStars from "beauty-stars"; const products=[ { id:'A1', pro:pro1, name:'Apple iPhone 7 Plus 128GB ( With Official Warranty)', rating:3, price:20000 }, { id:'A2', pro:pro2, name:'Apple iPhone 11 128GB Dual Sim (Slightly Used PTA Approved)', rating:0, price:25000 }, { id:'A3', pro:pro3, name:'Apple iPhone 11 Pro 64GB Dual Sim (without PTA Approved)', rating:0, price:30000 }, { id:'A4', pro:pro4, name:'Apple iPhone 11 Pro 256GB Dual Sim (without PTA Approved)', rating:0, price:55000 }, { id:'A5', pro:pro5, name:'Apple iPhone 11 Pro 512GB', rating:0, // rating5:0, price:60000 }, { id:'A6', pro:pro6, name:'Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max 64GB (without PTA Approved)', rating:0, // rating6:0, price:80000 }, { id:'A7', pro:pro7, name:'Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max 64GB Dual Sim (without PTA Approved)', rating:4, // rating7:0, price:100000 }, { id:'A8', pro:pro8, name:'Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max 256GB (without PTA Approved)', rating:0, // rating8:0, price:110000 }, { id:'A9', pro:pro9, name:'Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max 256GB Dual Sim (without PTA Approved)', rating:0, price:85000 }, {id:'A10', pro:pro10, name:'Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max 512GB (without PTA Approved)', rating:0, price:85000 }, { id:'A11', pro:pro11, name:'Apple iPhone SE (2020) 64GB With Official Warranty ', rating:0, price:60000 }, { id:'A12', pro:pro12, name:'Apple iPhone SE (2020) 128GB With Official Warranty ', rating:0, price:90000 }, { id:'A13', pro:pro13, name:'Apple iPhone SE (2020) 128GB Without PTA Approved', rating:0, price:80000 }, { id:'A14', pro:pro14, name:'Apple Ipad 7th Gen 10.2 Smart Case', rating:0, // rating5:0, price:100000 }, { id:'A15', pro:pro15, name:'Apple MacBook Air 13” MVFM2 (2019) Gold Retina Display with Touch ID', rating:0, // rating6:0, price:100000 }, { id:'A16', pro:pro16, name:'Apple Macbook Pro MUHN2 13” Touch Bar and Touch ID (2019) Space Gray ', rating:4, // rating7:0, price:100000 }, { id:'A17', pro:pro17, name:'Apple Macbook Pro MVVJ2 16” Touch Bar and Touch ID (2019) Space Gray ', rating:0, price:90000 }, { id:'A18', pro:pro18, name:'Apple Macbook Pro MVVK2 16” Touch Bar and Touch ID (2019) Space Gray ', rating:0, // rating5:0, price:100000 }, ] var filteredProducts=[ { id:'A1', pro:pro1, name:'Apple iPhone 7 Plus 128GB ( With Official Warranty)', rating:3, price:20000 }, { id:'A2', pro:pro2, name:'Apple iPhone 11 128GB Dual Sim (Slightly Used PTA Approved)', rating:0, price:25000 }, { id:'A3', pro:pro3, name:'Apple iPhone 11 Pro 64GB Dual Sim (without PTA Approved)', rating:0, price:30000 }, { id:'A4', pro:pro4, name:'Apple iPhone 11 Pro 256GB Dual Sim (without PTA Approved)', rating:0, price:55000 }, { id:'A5', pro:pro5, name:'Apple iPhone 11 Pro 512GB', rating:0, // rating5:0, price:60000 }, { id:'A6', pro:pro6, name:'Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max 64GB (without PTA Approved)', rating:0, // rating6:0, price:80000 }, ] export default class extends Component{ state = { minvalue:0, maxvalue:5000, p1value: products[0]['rating'], p2value: products[1]['rating'], p3value: products[2]['rating'] , p4value: products[3]['rating'], p5value: products[4]['rating'], p6value: products[5]['rating'], p7value: products[6]['rating'], p8value: products[7]['rating'], p9value: products[8]['rating'], p10value: products[9]['rating'], p11value: products[10]['rating'],}; constructor(props){ super(props); this.filtered = this.filtered.bind(this); } forceUpdateHandler(){ this.forceUpdate(); }; clear(){ document.getElementById('price-min').innerHTML=0 +' PKR'; document.getElementById('price-max').innerHTML=5000 +' PKR'; document.getElementById('size').value="N/A"; } changeGender(id){ document.getElementById('gender').innerHTML=document.getElementById(id).innerHTML; } changeSize(size){ document.getElementById('size').innerHTML=document.getElementById(size).innerHTML; } filtered(j=0){ var x=0; var total=document.getElementById('show').value; filteredProducts=[] if(j==0){ var min=document.getElementById('price-min').innerHTML; var max=document.getElementById('price-max').innerHTML; for (var i=0;i=Number(min.split(" ")[0]) && Number(products[i]['price']) <=Number(max.split(" ")[0]) && x < div className="section">

{filteredProducts.filter(product=>product).map(filteredproduct=>(

this.setState({p1value})} />

))}

) } }
